title: Blacklist and block
author: VD
content_html: It’s time for the Alt-Right to take the lead in showing the Right how to block and blacklist the sites of the Left. Not because we fear this, but because they fear it. Remember, they always project. This is the true story of the little boy who grew up to become Ricky Vaughn, Influencer of Elections and Alt-Right troll extraordinaire.
content_text:
